about_loh_text: Loh Coffee & Eatery is a popular destination in the heart of Denpasar City, Bali, that attracts both coffee enthusiasts and foodies. We offer a variety of coffee, tea, and food items, including sandwiches, salads, and pastries, all made with the freshest ingredients. Our cafe features a cozy and comfortable atmosphere with a tropical concept, making it the perfect place to relax and enjoy your time. We also provide free WiFi and charging stations for our customers' convenience. We are open from 8 AM to 10 PM, so you can stop by anytime for a quick bite or a leisurely meal. In addition, we are available for private events such as birthday parties, bridal showers, and baby showers.
about_mobile: About Loh Coffee and Eatery Mobile App
about_mobile_text: The Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application is a convenient and intuitive platform that allows customers to easily order food and beverages, reserve tables, and receive personalized recommendations from the cafe. Our app offers a range of unique features to connect with our customers such as submitting review as well as a curated selection of announcements and updates that keep customers informed about the latest menu items, events, and collaborations with other local businesses. At Loh Coffee and Eatery, we're committed to providing high-quality, sustainably sourced ingredients and fostering a welcoming, inclusive community of coffee and food lovers. With our mobile app, customers can experience the best of what our cafe has to offer, all from the convenience of their phone.
about_features: Features of Loh Coffee and Eatery Mobile Application
about_features_text: The Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application includes features such as registration and password reset, managing user information and preferences, managing the cafe's menu and reviews, placing and managing orders, making payments, reserving tables, and receiving announcements and recommendations from the cafe.
about_availability: Loh Coffee and Eatery Mobile Application Availability
about_availability_text: The Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application is available on both Android and iOS devices.
faq_account_1: How do I register for the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_account_1_ans: To register for an account in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application, click on the 'Register' button on the login page and follow the instructions to enter your personal information and create a new account.
faq_account_2: How do I reset my password n the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_account_2_ans: To reset your password in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application, click on the 'Forgot Password' button on the login page and follow the instructions to enter your email address and reset your password.
faq_account_3: How do I manage my user information and preferences in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_account_3_ans: To manage your user information and preferences in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application, go to the 'Profile' page and click on the 'Edit Profile' button. From there, you can update your name, email address, and date of birth. You can also update your menu preferences by clicking on the 'Edit Menu Preferences' button.
faq_account_4: Can I change my display name or email address in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_account_4_ans: Yes, you can change your display name and email address in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application by going to the 'Profile' page and clicking on the 'Edit Profile' button. From there, you can update your name and email address.
faq_order_1: Can I view the menu in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application?
faq_order_1_ans: Yes, you can view the menu in the application by going to the 'Home Page' which can be accessed through tapping the bottom navigation.
faq_order_2: How do I place an order in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application?
faq_order_2_ans: To place an order in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application, go to the 'Home' page, select the menu you want to order by tapping add to cart. Then, go to the 'Cart' page by tapping on cart button in the bottom right corner. After that, select for the dining option and payment option, and tap 'Pay Now'.
faq_order_3: Can I cancel an order in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application?
faq_order_3_ans: No, you cannot cancel an order in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application. You can only cancel an order before it is confirmed by the administrator. Once the order is confirmed, you will not be able to cancel it.
faq_order_4: What dining options are available in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_order_4_ans: There are two dining options available in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application: Dine in and Takeaway.
faq_order_5: What payment options are available in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_order_5_ans: There are two payment options available in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application: QRIS and Pay at the Cashier.
faq_order_6_ans: The QRIS payment option provides the customer with a barcode to scan and make payment for their order using their phone. The payment is done outside the application, and the customer must upload their payment receipt to the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application for the administrator to accept or reject the payment.
faq_order_7: How does the QRIS payment option work?
faq_order_7_ans: To use the QRIS payment option, the customer must select the QRIS option at checkout and receive a barcode to scan for payment. They must then make the payment outside the application and upload the payment receipt to the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application. The administrator will review the payment receipt and either accept or reject the payment.
faq_order_8: What happens if the administrator rejects a QRIS payment?
faq_order_8_ans: If the administrator rejects a QRIS payment, the customer order's status will be automatically canceled. The customer will be informed by the staff and the customer have to re-order.
faq_order_9: Can I use E-wallet for QRIS payment?
faq_order_9_ans: Yes, you can use an E-wallet for QRIS payment, as long as the payment is accepted by the QRIS provider. Please check with your payment provider for more information.
faq_order_10: What is Pay at the Cashier payment option?
faq_order_10_ans: The Pay at the Cashier payment option requires the customer to go to the cashier manually to pay for their order. They can place their order in the mobile application and select the Pay at Cashier option at the cart page.
faq_order_11: Where can I find the order history in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_order_11_ans: You can find your order history in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application by going to the 'Orders' page which can be accessed through tapping the bottom navigation.
faq_order_12: What to do if I have completed my payment?
faq_order_12_ans: If you have completed your payment, The administrator will review the payment receipt and either accept or reject the payment. If the payment is accepted, the order status will be changed to 'Confirmed' and the customer wait for the order to be delivered.
faq_order_13: My payment is confirmed but my order status is rejected?
faq_order_13_ans: If your payment is confirmed but your order status is rejected, it means that the order is rejected. It is possible that the order is rejected because the menu is not available at the moment. You will be informed by the staff and you can re-order.
faq_order_14: What if I choose to take away my order?
faq_order_14_ans: If you choose to take away your order, just need to wait for the order to be ready and the staff will call you to pick up your order.
faq_reserve_1: How do I reserve a table in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application?
faq_reserve_1_ans: To reserve a table in the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application, go to the 'Reserve' navigation page which is located in the bottom navigation bar. Then, select the date and time you want to reserve a table, select the table number available, then tap 'Reserve Now'.
faq_reserve_2: Can I reserve on the day when I make reservation?
faq_reserve_2_ans: Sorry, you cannot reserve on the day when you make reservation. You can only reserve a table for the next day onwards.
faq_reserve_3: What time can reservation be made?
faq_reserve_3_ans: You can make reservation from 10:00 AM to 9:00 PM.
faq_reserve_4: What day reservation can be made?
faq_reserve_4_ans: You can make reservation from Monday to Sunday. National holidays are not included. Please check our social media for updates on our operating days.
faq_reserve_5_ans: Yes, you can cancel your reservation before the reservation day. You can cancel your reservation by going to the 'Reserves' page which can be accessed through tapping the bottom navigation. Then, tap the 'Cancel' button to cancel your reservation.
faq_reserve_6: Should I print the reservation proof?
faq_reserve_6_ans: No, you do not need to print the reservation proof. You can show the reservation proof on your mobile phone to the staff.
faq_general_1: How do I switch the language in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application?
faq_general_1_ans: Our application provide 2 languages which are English as the default and Bahasa. To switch the language, go to the 'Profile' navigation page which is located in the bottom navigation bar. Then, tap the 'Switch to Bahasa' toggle button to switch the language to Bahasa. To switch back to English, tap again the toggle button.
faq_general_2: How do I switch to dark mode in the Loh Coffee and Eatery application?
faq_general_2_ans: Our application provide 2 themes which are light mode as the default and dark mode. To switch to dark mode, go to the 'Profile' navigation page which is located in the bottom navigation bar. Then, tap the 'Switch to Dark Mode' toggle button to switch to dark mode. To switch back to light mode, tap again the toggle button.
faq_general_3: Will the Dark Mode and language setting be saved for future use?
faq_general_3_ans: Yes, the Dark Mode and language setting will be saved for future use.
faq_general_4: Can I submit a review of my experience at Loh Coffee and Eatery in the application?
faq_general_4_ans: Yes, you can submit a review by going to the Submit Review section and providing your feedback. Your feedback will be reviewed by our team to improve our service quality.
faq_general_5: Can the Loh Coffee and Eatery application recommend menu items based on my preferences?
faq_general_5_ans: Yes, you can view the recommended menu items based on your preferences, most loved, and most ordered by going to the Recommended Menu section.
app_overview_text: The Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application is a convenient and intuitive platform that allows customers to easily order food and beverages, reserve tables, and receive personalized recommendations from the cafe. Our app offers a range of unique features to connect with our customers such as submitting review as well as a curated selection of announcements and updates that keep customers informed about the latest menu items, events, and collaborations with other local businesses. At Loh Coffee and Eatery, we're committed to providing high-quality, sustainably sourced ingredients and fostering a welcoming, inclusive community of coffee and food lovers. With our mobile app, customers can experience the best of what our cafe has to offer, all from the convenience of their phone.
data_type_collect_text: When you use the Loh Coffee and Eatery application, we may collect the following types of data:
personal_information_text: This includes your name, date of birth and email address. We collect this information when you register for an account, make a reservation, or place an order.
order_and_reservation_information_text: This includes the items you order, the time and date of your reservation, and the number of people in your party. We collect this information to process your orders and reservations.
payment_information_text: This includes your payment method and payment details. We collect this information to process your payments.
use_of_your_data_text: We use your data to provide you with the best possible experience when using the Loh Coffee and Eatery application. Specifically, we use your data for the following purposes:
facilitate: Facilitate the creation of and secure your Account
facilitate_text: We use your data to facilitate the creation of and secure your account on our network. This includes verifying your identity, processing payments, and providing customer support.
process_order_reserve: To process your orders and reservations:
process_order_reserve_text: We use your personal information, order and reservation information, and payment information to process your orders and reservations.
improve_our_service_text: We may use your data to analyze customer behavior and preferences, which helps us improve our menu offerings and overall customer experience.
communicate_with_you_text: We may use your email address to send you updates about your orders and reservations, as well as promotional offers and other relevant information.
data_security_text: We take the security of your data very seriously. We use industry-standard encryption technologies when transferring and receiving customer data exchanged with our application. Firebase implements industry-standard security measures, such as encryption in transit and at rest, to protect user data. We also limit access to user data to authorized personnel who require access to provide services.
account_text: Registered users of the Loh Coffee and Eatery mobile application can access and manage their account information, including personal data, by clicking on the 'Profile' button in the application.
changes_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
contact_us_text: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at:
address_loh: Address: Jl. Tukad Musi I No.9A, Renon, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80226
operating_hours_text: Our operating hours are from 10:00 AM to 9:00 PM, Monday to Sunday.
